title: Father's Day Breakfast Bagel Sandwich

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText: www.blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/  Thank you for watching. Make sure you subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube channel.

transcripts:
Let's make dad a crazy good breakfast bagel sandwich. 

[MUSIC PLAYING] 

Start by putting sliced bacon on a baking sheet and cook at 400 degrees until beautifully crisp-- 15 to 20 minutes. Heat a nonstick pan or griddle and add some sliced deli pastrami. Then add a little butter and crack an egg, break the yoke, and season with salt and pepper. When lightly browned, flip the pastrami, then flip the egg, and add a piece of cheese. 

Combine mayonnaise with a little hot sauce, mix well and set aside. Toast or grill a sliced bagel, then build. The bagel, some mayo, fresh avocado, sprouts, the pastrami, the egg and cheese, the bacon, and then top and serve. Trust me, I will love it. I mean, your dad will love it. 

[MUSIC PLAYING]
